question_text:
Question 45 
 
 
[Geomatics Engineering : Levelling]
 
 
A map is prepared with a scale of 
1:1000
 and a contour interval of 1 m.  if the distance between two 
adjacent contours on the map is 10 mm, the slope of the ground between the adjacent contours is  
 
(A) 30% 
(B) 10% 
 
(C) 35% 
(D) 40% 
Ans. (B)
